{"id":1066223529,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1696363480,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"107 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1066223529/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Value of an Ordered Triplet II","memory":"86.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n   long long maximumTripletValue(vector<int>& A) {\n        long long res = 0;\n        int maxa = 0, maxab = 0;\n        for (int&a : A) {   \n            res = max(res, 1LL * maxab * a);\n            maxab = max(maxab, maxa - a);\n            maxa = max(maxa, a);\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-value-of-an-ordered-triplet-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
